resources.string: If you enjoy playing this app, would you mind taking a moment to rate it ?

Note:- 

1. You can redeem stock will refresh at 09:00AM to 09:15AM on only every thursday.Please reedmen as soon as possible ON TIME. 


2. Money Will be transferred within 10 - 20 working days.


3. 18% GST and 5% transaction charge will be deduct from payale amount.


4. The Count to earn reserves the right of final decision and interpretation in the case of any dispute.
